00062    /* 
00063    * Destructor.   
00064    */
00065    FileMaster::~FileMaster() 
00066    {
00067       if (paramFilePtr_) {
00068          paramFilePtr_->close();
00069          delete paramFilePtr_;
00070       }
00071       if (commandFilePtr_) {
00072          commandFilePtr_->close();
00073          delete commandFilePtr_;
00074       }
00075    }

00077    /*
00078    * Set root prefix for all path names.
00079    */
00080    void FileMaster::setRootPrefix(const std::string& rootPrefix)
00081    {  rootPrefix_ = rootPrefix; }
00082 
00083    /*
00084    * Set a directory Id prefix.
00085    */
00086    void FileMaster::setDirectoryId(int rank)
00087    {
00088       std::stringstream sMyId;
00089       sMyId << rank;
00090       directoryIdPrefix_ = sMyId.str();
00091       directoryIdPrefix_ += "/";
00092       hasDirectoryId_ = true;
00093    }
00094 
00095    /*
00096    * Set paramFile() to return std::cin even if a directory id has been set.
00097    */
00098    void FileMaster::setParamFileStdIn()
00099    {  isSetParamFileStdIn_ = true; }

00119    /* 
00120    * Read parameters from file.
00121    */
00122    void FileMaster::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00123    {
00124       readBegin(in, "FileMaster");
00125       read<std::string>(in, "commandFileName",  commandFileName_);
00126       read<std::string>(in, "inputPrefix",  inputPrefix_);
00127       read<std::string>(in, "outputPrefix", outputPrefix_);
00128       readEnd(in);
00129    }
00130 
00131    /*
00132    * Get the default parameter stream.
00133    */
00134    std::istream& FileMaster::paramFile()
00135    {
00136 
00137       if ((!hasDirectoryId_) || isSetParamFileStdIn_) { 
00138 
00139          return std::cin;
00140 
00141       } else { 
00142 
00143          if (!paramFilePtr_) { 
00144 
00145             // Construct filename "n/param" for processor n
00146             std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00147             if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00148                filename += directoryIdPrefix_;
00149             }
00150             filename += "param";
00151       
00152             // Open parameter input file
00153             std::ifstream* filePtr = new std::ifstream();
00154             filePtr->open(filename.c_str());
00155             if (filePtr->fail()) {
00156                std::string message = "Error opening parameter file. Filename: ";
00157                message += filename;
00158                UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00159             }
00160             paramFilePtr_ = filePtr;
00161 
00162          }
00163 
00164          return *paramFilePtr_;
00165       }
00166    }
00167 
00168    /*
00169    * Get the command input stream by reference.
00170    */
00171    std::istream& FileMaster::commandFile()
00172    {
00173 
00174       if (commandFileName_ == "paramfile") {
00175 
00176          return paramFile();
00177 
00178       } else { 
00179 
00180          if (!commandFilePtr_) { 
00181 
00182             // Construct filename "n/param" for processor n
00183             std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00184             if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00185                filename += directoryIdPrefix_;
00186             }
00187             filename += commandFileName_;
00188       
00189             // Open parameter input file
00190             std::ifstream* filePtr = new std::ifstream();
00191             filePtr->open(filename.c_str());
00192             if (filePtr->fail()) {
00193                std::string message;
00194                message = "Error opening command file. Filename: ";
00195                message += filename;
00196                UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00197             }
00198             commandFilePtr_ = filePtr;
00199 
00200          }
00201 
00202          return *commandFilePtr_;
00203       }
00204    }

00206    /*
00207    * Open and return an input file named inputPrefix + name
00208    */
00209    void
00210    FileMaster::openInputFile(const std::string& name, std::ifstream& in) const
00211    {
00212       // Construct filename = inputPrefix_ + name
00213       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00214       if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00215          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00216       }
00217       filename += inputPrefix_;
00218       filename += name;
00219 
00220       in.open(filename.c_str());
00221 
00222       // Check for error opening file
00223       if (in.fail()) {
00224          std::string message = "Error opening input file. Filename: ";
00225          message += filename;
00226          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00227       }
00228 
00229    }
00230 
00231    /*
00232    * Open and return an output file named outputPrefix + name
00233    */
00234    void
00235    FileMaster::openOutputFile(const std::string& name, std::ofstream& out) 
00236    const
00237    {
00238       // Construct filename = outputPrefix_ + name
00239       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00240       if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00241          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00242       }
00243       filename += outputPrefix_;
00244       filename += name;
00245 
00246       out.open(filename.c_str());
00247 
00248       // Check for error opening file
00249       if (out.fail()) {
00250          std::string message = "Error opening output file. Filename: ";
00251          message += filename;
00252          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00253       }
00254 
00255    }

00257    /*
00258    * Open an input restart parameter file.
00259    */
00260    void FileMaster::openParamIFile(const std::string& name, const char* ext,
00261                                    std::ifstream& in) const
00262    {
00263       // Construct filename 
00264       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00265       if (hasDirectoryId_ && !isSetParamFileStdIn_) {
00266          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00267       }
00268       filename += name;
00269       filename += ext;
00270 
00271       in.open(filename.c_str());
00272       if (in.fail()) {
00273          std::string message = "Error opening input file. Filename: ";
00274          message += filename;
00275          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00276       }
00277    }

00279    /*
00280    * Open a restart parameter file for writing.
00281    */
00282    void FileMaster::openParamOFile(const std::string& name, const char* ext,
00283                                    std::ofstream& out) const
00284    {
00285       // Construct filename = outputPrefix_ + name
00286       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00287       if (hasDirectoryId_ && !isSetParamFileStdIn_) {
00288          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00289       }
00290       filename += name;
00291       filename += ext;
00292 
00293       out.open(filename.c_str());
00294       if (out.fail()) {
00295          std::string message = "Error opening output file. Filename: ";
00296          message += filename;
00297          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00298       }
00299    }

00306    {

00346    /*
00347    * Will paramFile() return std::cin ?
00348    */ 
00349    bool FileMaster::isParamFileStdIn() const
00350    {  return ((!hasDirectoryId_) || isSetParamFileStdIn_); }
